data.description: Unitap is an onboarding tool for networks and communities and a gateway to web3
data.title: Unitap

data.description:
Onboarding people into web3 & its ecosystems has always been a challenge. 

Unitap is a platform to onboard new unique individuals to web3 ecosystems and their Dapps easily and get rewarded for learning. We help users go from zero to one on their crypto journey.

“Tell me and I forget,
Show me and I may remember
Involve me and I learn”
- Confucius

Everyone uses Google daily without understanding the underlying mechanics of the internet. Our philosophy at Unitap is to involve people in web3 instead of burdening them with understanding complex concepts such as blockchains, PoW, and PoS. Additionally, we believe that starting the journey into Web3 shouldn’t come with an entrance fee. Unitap makes sure everyone’s initial steps into Web3 are free, easy, and understandable.

Unitap includes:
Learn Tap: The Web3 university where you can start from zero and learn everything by doing Web3 activities.

Token Tap: A general-purpose token distribution tool where anyone can distribute any kind of tokens gated by their desired requirements.

Prize Tap: A general-purpose raffle creation tool where people can create raffles and gate them with the requirements they want.

Gas Tap: Unique humans can obtain tiny amounts of gas tokens on almost all the major EVM networks to start using the networks.

Contribution-Hub: A place where anyone can set their token distribution, raffle, and learning mission in a permissionless manner.


What makes Unitap unique?

Ultimate Onboarding tool: Unitap has everything you need to start onboarding users to your dApp/social media and enlighten them about your project.

Flexible incentive tool: Creating an incentive program on Unitap has no limits. There are lots of Sybil-resistance tools and integrated apps that you can use as requirements to shape your campaign.

Public-access integration: once you integrate with Unitap, anyone can distribute rewards based on your platform’s activity for free.

Zero-to-One educational content: Unitap helps you educate users by providing high-quality content. We offer two kinds of videos, Conceptual and How-to-Do.
data.title: Unitap
Unitap in Celo
data.description:
Onboarding people into web3 & its ecosystems has always been a challenge.

Unitap is a platform to onboard new unique individuals to web3 ecosystems and their Dapps easily and get rewarded for learning. We help users go from zero to one on their crypto journey.

“Tell me and I forget, Show me and I may remember Involve me and I learn”
Confucius

Everyone uses Google daily without understanding the underlying mechanics of the internet. Our philosophy at Unitap is to involve people in web3 instead of burdening them with understanding complex concepts such as blockchains, PoW, and PoS. Additionally, we believe that starting the journey into Web3 shouldn’t come with an entrance fee. Unitap makes sure everyone’s initial steps into Web3 are free, easy, and understandable.

Unitap includes: 
Learn Tap: The Web3 university where you can start from zero and learn everything by doing Web3 activities.

Token Tap: A general-purpose token distribution tool where anyone can distribute any kind of tokens gated by their desired requirements.

Prize Tap: A general-purpose raffle creation tool where people can create raffles and gate them with the requirements they want.

Gas Tap: Unique humans can obtain tiny amounts of gas tokens on almost all the major EVM networks to start using the networks.

Contribution-Hub: A place where anyone can set their token distribution, raffle, and learning mission in a permissionless manner.

What makes Unitap unique?

Ultimate Onboarding tool: Unitap has everything you need to start onboarding users to your dApp/social media and enlighten them about your project.

Flexible incentive tool: Creating an incentive program on Unitap has no limits. There are lots of Sybil-resistance tools and integrated apps that you can use as requirements to shape your campaign.

Public-access integration: once you integrate with Unitap, anyone can distribute rewards based on your platform’s activity for free.

Zero-to-One educational content: Unitap helps you educate users by providing high-quality content. We offer two kinds of videos, Conceptual and How-to-Do.

Unitap simplifies web3 onboarding with its Gas Tap and Token Tap features. The Gas Tap has already helped over 4,000 users claim gas tokens on 28 networks, easing the initial hurdle of acquiring gas. The Token Tap allows users to claim various project and DAO tokens, like Bitcoin, $SONG, and $BRIGHT, promoting active participation in governance. Unitap plans to expand its token offerings and welcomes suggestions for new additions.

Project GitHub Repo

questions.explanation: We've been participating in Gitcoin rounds since GG16

questions.query: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.
questions.explanation:
Unitap is an onboarding and loyalty platform for web3 that helps web3 projects to onboard and acquire users.
We have already helped many projects and networks to engage users and incentivize them.

questions.query: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?
questions.explanation: Web3 projects can incentivize users based on on-chain, off-chain, and social media activities. We also offer them a variety of gamification methods, like holding a raffle.

questions.query: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?
questions.explanation:
We're going to launch the next version of our dashboard. You can see a demo here:
https://www.figma.com/proto/Jng5iJTD64BV5oDoPJZWZa/unitap_dashboard?node-id=419-25416&p=f&t=bjMq9fcQcQa3HDMU-0&scaling=min-zoom&content-scaling=fixed&page-id=0%3A1

questions.query: How does your project contribute to the advancement of the Arbitrum ecosystem?

Describe your previous work or plans related to the Arbitrum ecosystem. How does your project strengthen Arbitrum's foundational infrastructure, improve developer efficiency, or accelerate the adoption of novel applications?
questions.explanation: We've deployed our tools on Arbitrum and we've been integrating with many Arbitrum activities like the official Arbitrum bridge, delegate ARB token, Gitcoin Passport, etc

questions.query: If applicable, describe how your project leverages Stylus or Arbitrum Orbit Chains. What unique capabilities or use cases does this enable?
Describe your team's expertise in your chosen focus area within the Arbitrum ecosystem. Include relevant experience, publications, or past projects.
questions.explanation: We've been in the space since 2016 and we've been working on BrightID and many other products.

questions.query: List any contract addresses with the associated network(s), EOAs, or deployer addresses your project has deployed.
Have you received any previous grants or support for your work in the Arbitrum ecosystem? If so, please provide details and estimated funding amounts.
Would you like to share anything else about your project, team, or vision for the Arbitrum ecosystem that wasn't covered in the previous questions?
Project GitHub Repo
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.
questions.explanation: GG16 or 17 to GG21, plus a few community rounds like Arbitrum, Polygon and Metis

questions.query: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.
questions.explanation: We provide production-ready tools for user onboarding and incentivization. We help projects acquire users easier.

questions.query: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?
questions.explanation: We offer a raffle creator and also a first-come-first-serve reward mechanism. We built a flexible tool so it can be integrated with any on-chain, off-chain, and social media activities.

questions.query: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?
questions.explanation: We're working on a zero-to-one onboarding program where we sponsor unique users to get onboarded into web3
